content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Greetings, Nesibe. Thank you for considering my apartment. I understand that you are interested in renting it, but I would like to clarify a few points. Can you tell me how long you plan to rent the apartment for? This information will help me determine the most suitable rental price for you.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I want to rent the apartment for a year.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for letting me know. I am pleased to hear that you are interested in renting the apartment for a year. Based on the size of the apartment and the length of the rental period, I would like to propose a rental price of €10,000 per year. However, I am open to negotiation. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am okay with that price, thank you.
I agree to the price of €10,000 per year.
TERMINATE
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Excellent! I am glad to hear that we have reached an agreement. Thank you for choosing my apartment. I look forward to working with you. If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact me. Have a great day!
name: Heinrich Heine
